None.Name: Crashdive
None.Description: Unit starts a powerful suicidal attack that deals 500 damage to enemies in a 25m radius around its target, up to 2000 in total. Unit dies during the attack. Knocks back small and medium units. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Reincarnation
None.Description: When unit dies after performing a Crashdive it may rise like a phoenix. To be reborn it needs to collect 2000 life points from corpses within a 25m radius 3 seconds after its death.
